landing.title: Your Personal Meal Planning Companion
landing.subtitle: Plan your meals, track your health goals, and achieve your ideal weight with personalized suggestions, smart reminders, and a judgment-free approach to healthy eating.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Eating Habits?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who have achieved their health goals with MealPlanner. No judgment, just progress.

auth.signInContinue: Sign in to continue your health journey
auth.startJourney: Start your journey to healthier eating
auth.somethingWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

dashboard.mealPlanToday: Here's your meal plan for today. You're doing great!
dashboard.keepItUp: Keep it up! You're on fire!

features.calorieTrackingDesc: Track your daily calorie intake with detailed nutritional information for every meal.
features.personalizedGoalsDesc: Set and achieve your health goals with customized meal plans aligned to your needs.
features.smartRemindersDesc: Never miss a meal with intelligent reminders and make-up suggestions.
features.globalCuisineDesc: Explore diverse meals from around the world while staying on track.
features.progressTrackingDesc: Monitor your weight and health progress with daily, weekly, and monthly logs.
features.rewardsSystemDesc: Earn treats and off-days for your consistency. You deserve it!
features.favoriteSnacksDesc: Add your comfort foods without judgment. Balance is key to success.
features.weightManagementDesc: Track your weight journey with smart suggestions and milestone celebrations.
features.redFlagAlertsDesc: Get gentle nudges when you stray from your path, with helpful recovery options.

trial.daysRemaining: days remaining in your free trial
trial.trialBenefits: Get full access to all features for 30 days, no payment required

foodMenu.title: Ugandan Food Menu
foodMenu.description: Discover traditional and modern Ugandan dishes

doctorReport.title: Doctor Report
doctorReport.name: Name
doctorReport.noDataAvailable: No data available for this period
doctorReport.disclaimer: This report is generated from self-reported data in MealPlanner. It should be used as a reference only and does not constitute medical advice. Please consult with your healthcare provider for medical guidance.

mealLogging.selectMeal: Please select a meal or enter custom meal details
